featured.text: While the Iron Curtain was still in place under the communist government, Prague was ＿29＿ visited by foreigners.
The foreigner was speaking so fast that nobody was able to ______

definition.zh_def: 外國人；來自其他國家的人。
definition.en_def: A person from a country other than one's own.
definition.example: She met a foreigner while traveling in Europe.
